programme.title: Helen Dorn: The Red Cloth
programme.desc: A fatal arson incident draws Helen Dorn into a far-left extremist community, who has targeted wealthy real estate agent Ralph Wagner. While they deny any involvement in the crime, it is indeed suspicious that they were previously almost ousted by Wagner.

programme.title: Meisie
programme.desc: A young school teacher is posted to a small rural town, where she meets Meisie, a gifted girl who wants to learn but isn’t allowed to. Before she can teach Meisie, the teacher must first convince her father of the benefits and importance of education.

programme.title: Complicity
programme.desc: Inspired by a real-life incident. Cheng Liang, a Chinese illegal immigrant in Japan finds new direction when he fakes his identity and lands an apprenticeship with a master soba chef. However, the threat of deportation always lurks around the corner.

programme.title: Black As The Snow
programme.desc: A serial killer is on the rampage in the ski resort of Morzine-Avoriaz. Vivier, French police officer teams up with the Swiss policeman Meyer to investigate the suspicious deaths of teenagers. They must find the killer before the victim list grows.

programme.title: Roise & Frank
programme.desc: Recently widowed Róise is struggling with her grief following her husband's passing. However, when a stray dog starts to follow her around, she starts to believe that it might be the reincarnation of her husband.

programme.title: Dogworld
programme.desc: In the near future, two friends dream of leaving the Italian city of Taranto, a wasteland ruled over by warring gangs and surrounded by barbed wire. Recruited by a local gang, and with a girl coming between them, their friendship is put to the test.

programme.title: Masha
programme.desc: Masha has grown up between the boxing ring and the streets of her provincial Russian town. Her closest friends, young gangsters who are loathed by the entire town, love and protect her. And suddenly the cruel truth about them is revealed to her.

programme.title: Karakol
programme.desc: After recently losing her father, Clara discovers a passport, foreign bills and letters while going through his things. Suspecting that he is living a secret life, she embarks on a trip to Karakil, a lake in Tajikistan, to find out the truth.

programme.title: Meisie
programme.desc: A young school teacher is posted to a small rural town, where she meets Meisie, a gifted girl who wants to learn but isn’t allowed to. Before she can teach Meisie, the teacher must first convince her father of the benefits and importance of education.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Spook
programme.desc: In an abandoned villa, three children witness a fierce fight between Jakob Stocking and a building contractor. Jakob kills him but returns later with his lawyer to turn himself in. As questions pile up, two detectives uncover a long-kept family secret.

programme.title: Gossip
programme.desc: A junior overhears some juicy gossip, but when she attempts to retell it, she falls flat and bores her audience. Frustrated with her lacklustre storytelling skills, a group of seniors take it upon themselves to teach her the art of gossiping.

programme.title: Victim
programme.desc: Ukrainian immigrant Irina lives with her son Igor in a small Czech border town. When she discovers that Igor has been assaulted by three Romas her whole world comes crashing down. As times goes on, Irina begins to spot inconsistencies in his story.

programme.title: To My Beloved
programme.desc: Fernando is a good man who takes care of his only child, Daniel. Following the death of his wife Ana, every night Fernando recalls their love as he sorts out his beloved dead spouse’s belongings. One day he finds a VHS tape that will change everything.

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: March 1984, a few miles off the south coast of Iceland, a fishing boat sank with all its men. One of the crew members miraculously survived. After six hours in the ocean, the exhausted man is washed ashore, only to find himself on a deadly lava field.

programme.title: Victoria Must Go
programme.desc: Hedvig and Henrik's new stepmother Victoria is annoying and constantly introducing new rules. They decide to hire a hitman to get rid of her, and end up persuading a very reluctant immigrant, Carl, to do the job.

programme.title: Helen Dorn: The Right To Remain Silent
programme.desc: During a hunting trip, Rolf Kanther, director of a military tech manufacturer, is shot right next to his daughter. Inspector Helen Dorn is sent to investigate the suspicious death, and needs to find out if it's an accident or a calculated murder.

programme.title: Karakol
programme.desc: After recently losing her father, Clara discovers a passport, foreign bills and letters while going through his things. Suspecting that he is living a secret life, she embarks on a trip to Karakil, a lake in Tajikistan, to find out the truth.

programme.title: Dogworld
programme.desc: In the near future, two friends dream of leaving the Italian city of Taranto, a wasteland ruled over by warring gangs and surrounded by barbed wire. Recruited by a local gang, and with a girl coming between them, their friendship is put to the test.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Spook
programme.desc: In an abandoned villa, three children witness a fierce fight between Jakob Stocking and a building contractor. Jakob kills him but returns later with his lawyer to turn himself in. As questions pile up, two detectives uncover a long-kept family secret.

programme.title: Victim
programme.desc: Ukrainian immigrant Irina lives with her son Igor in a small Czech border town. When she discovers that Igor has been assaulted by three Romas her whole world comes crashing down. As times goes on, Irina begins to spot inconsistencies in his story.

programme.title: Milk Teeth
programme.desc: Living in a small rural community, Skalde navigates societal stigma due to having an “outsider” mother. When she befriends a mysterious girl in the woods, Skalde jeopardizes everything, struggling to balance loyalty to her community and her newfound bond.

programme.title: To My Beloved
programme.desc: Fernando is a good man who takes care of his only child, Daniel. Following the death of his wife Ana, every night Fernando recalls their love as he sorts out his beloved dead spouse’s belongings. One day he finds a VHS tape that will change everything.

programme.title: Irreplaceable
programme.desc: Jean-Pierre Werner, a revered and devoted country doctor, discovers that he is suffering from an inoperable tumor. As a doctor from the city arrives to help him with his practice, Werner is troubled by the thought that he is no longer irreplaceable.

programme.title: The Deep
programme.desc: March 1984, a few miles off the south coast of Iceland, a fishing boat sank with all its men. One of the crew members miraculously survived. After six hours in the ocean, the exhausted man is washed ashore, only to find himself on a deadly lava field.

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - The Soul Circle
programme.desc: Two detectives find a newborn baby in a basket on Lake Constance, with a mysterious message, and whose mother, Rita Hafner, was presumed murdered 6 months ago. Two detectives must investigate mysterious symbols and dark legends in order to save her.

programme.title: Victoria Must Go
programme.desc: Hedvig and Henrik's new stepmother Victoria is annoying and constantly introducing new rules. They decide to hire a hitman to get rid of her, and end up persuading a very reluctant immigrant, Carl, to do the job.

programme.title: King Of The Belgians
programme.desc: King Nicolas II of the Belgians is on a state visit to Istanbul when his country falls apart. With a solar storm shutting down air travel and communications, he must travel by road across the Balkans to save his country.

programme.title: All The Songs We Never Sang
programme.desc: Rebellious teen Natsumi ventures from Tokyo to a small island to meet her aunt and learn the art of pearl diving (but secretly to find a treasure she was told about as a child).

programme.title: Murder by the Lake - Procession
programme.desc: Marlene Stöhr is shot by a crossbow during the legendary “blood procession” with over 3000 horses and is on life support. Right before she was shot, she saw a precious racehorse presumed dead years ago. Two detectives are called to investigate.

programme.title: The Second
programme.desc: An author's success following the release of her celebrated erotic memoir is threatened when her best friend and muse reveals the truth behind the memoir's provenance, igniting an incendiary tale of sex, lies and betrayal.

programme.title: ONE Friday Fights 93
programme.desc: The world’s largest martial arts organization will kick off the new year with a bang when it brings electrifying combat sports action to Lumpinee Stadium in Bangkok, Thailand. ONE Friday Fights 93 goes down live in Asia primetime on January 10 and features 12 Muay Thai and MMA fights, with two-dozen rising stars looking for the coveted US$100,000 contract with ONE Championship. Headlining the event, Rajadamnern Stadium Muay Thai World Champion Kongchai Chanaidonmueang takes on Ramadan Ondash in a thrilling strawweight Muay Thai showdown. Kongchai aims to extend his winning streak, while Ondash chases a third straight victory in the weekly series against his toughest opponent yet. The card also features a clash between Worapon Sor Dechapan and knockout artist Soner Sen in a 142-pound catchweight Muay Thai bout, alongside exciting returns from Lebanese destroyer Abdallah Ondash, Filipina fast-rising star Islay Erika Bomogao, and undefeated Turkish wrestler Dzhabir Dzhabrailov.
